some modems arent real modem but "winmodems" which means they are missing an important piece of hardware.. some such modems have linux compatible drivers, but not all..
http://www.linmodems.org/  go there, and try their scanmodem tool
if you have a serial or usb modem (or just a real old modem) laying around, you'll be better off..
